title: new idea
body: how about give normal minions segmented hp bars like champions so they are easier to last-hit? or even better have their hp bar change color when it drops below 80 to indicate that its time to last hit

replies.body: Or you could just go into a custom game and practice last hitting for a couple of hours? As JB said each champion has different levels of damage, as well as different attack animations so it'd be kind of pointless to implement. No need to dumb the game down further.
stupid idea, learn to last hit yourself
